resources.string: Good morning! Our troops need to paint a new form.
Hello! For the main dish at the celebration need of paint.
Good day. To finish the repairs in the castle, we need a little paint.
My king! Our enemies have painted all the signs we need a paint that would save the kingdom.
Hello. Would you lend me some paint for happiness.
Yo, Pops! Give sympathetic ink on spending.
Good day to you sire. The neighbors holiday, you need to send envoys with gifts.
Aloha. I am a trader from Hawaii, if you sell me the paint?
Y-o-ra !!! Give quo paint! Or tui fight !!!
